entry.content: I just read a wondeful blog post by Adam Fletcher, What Does A Sysadmin Look Like In 10 Years?. This almost totally describes what I see as the future of system administors/engineers/architects, and DevOps. And what I try, or want, to do. It’s the most accurate and succinct description I’ve ever read.
